titleStmt.title: An ordinance of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament, for bringing in the arrears of the monethly assessment formerly charged upon the cities of London and Westminster, and all other parishes and places within the line of communication, and county of Middlesex.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: "26. Decem. 1644. H. Ellynge, Cler. Parl. D. Com."
Imperfect: heavily stained, with print show-through.
Reproduction of original in: Sutro Library.
